name: fftw3
description: FFTW is a C subroutine library for computing the discrete Fourier transform (DFT) in one or more dimensions, of arbitrary input size, and of both real and complex data (as well as of even/odd data, i.e. the discrete cosine/sine transforms or DCT/DST).

avx.description: Builds part of the library with avx, sse2, sse

avx2.description: Builds part of the library with avx2, fma, avx, sse2, sse

sse.description: Builds part of the library with sse

sse2.description: Builds part of the library with sse2, sse
